name: Twinkle Time
description:
A very simple 2D game made in Unity. The soundtrack came first and the game was inspired and built around that with the main goal of being cute.

Try to knock all of the clouds out of the play area before the song ends. Move the star using arrow keys or WSAD. Gameplay lasts about 25 seconds.

There is a "bug" which I didn't get around to fixing where you can multiply the number of clouds on screen by repeatedly pressing the space bar.
